divs: sighting detailsi was by the junk yard by nelles a.f.b las vegas n.v on 4-28.2011 the time was about 216 pm there were 2 f16 plane passed by n wright on top of the air plane there it was a u.f.o it pass the f16 like there were even there the u.f.o turn on a dine to the right goin east it was gon but this is not the first time i was on my way to italy in 1993 i look out the window n there it was a u.f.o i ask the girl next to me what in the hell is that she look everyone was looking the flight atendent ask me to clost the shade i said no she came back n look at my seat no. everyone was talking about it in the plane 2 hour later wen wee got to italy all over the paper u.f.o over italy i said i know what i saw thank you this is *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
